insert into front_company (company_name, create_id, create_dt, create_user_name, company_role, create_name, total_balance, default_address, amount_lbs, amount_cert, amount_sms, company_partner, company_short) values (#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalBalance,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amountLbs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{amountCert,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{amountSms,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{companyPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
